channel.title: Hi! I'm Jorge on Zebra
channel.description: Recent content in Hi! I'm Jorge on Zebra

item.title: HackTheBox Writeup: EarlyAccess
item.description: Really fun machine where OSINT is very important. I learned about Docker container privilege escalation.

item.title: HackTheBox Writeup: Developer
item.description: In this machine I learnt about tabnapping and had to reverse a binary using an AES cypher.

item.title: HackTheBox Writeup: Unicode
item.description: Machine that shows interesting attack vectors that came with unicode integration. This taught me what `jku` claims are and decompiling a python binary. Also new `bash` blacklist bypass methods.

item.title: HackTheBox Writeup: Backdoor
item.description: In this machine I learned the common attack vectors in Wordpress. Also to inspect the `proc` filesystem for running processes.

item.title: HackTheBox Writeup: Shibboleth
item.description: This machne has tought me about common `IPMI` attacks and *Zabbix* remote code execution.

item.title: HackTheBox Writeup: Pikaboo
item.description: In this machine I learned about `nginx` misconfigurations, `LDAP` enumeration, log poisoning and `perl` command injections.

item.title: HackTheBox Writeup: Secret
item.description: Simple machine to learn about *JWT* signing and root privileged core dumps to read file contents.

item.title: HackTheBox Writeup: Static
item.description: This machine teaches about recovering `gzip` files, some basics of *OneTimePasswords*, exploiting `xdebug` and path injection.

item.title: HackTheBox Writeup: Devzat
item.description: Simple machine with a lot of `OSINT` and an easy `bash` command injection.

item.title: HackTheBox Writeup: Bolt
item.description: Machine that can be solved with a bit of *OSINT*.* *It teaches about Chrome extensions `PGP` keys and *Server Side Template Injection*.

item.title: HackTheBox Writeup: Forge
item.description: Machine vulnerable to `SSRF` that teaches about Python Debugger exploitation.

item.title: HackTheBox Writeup: Driver
item.description: Windows machine which teaches about `SCF` to store `NTLM` hashes and the recent *Printer Spooler* vulnerability.

item.title: Notion API definition translation
item.description: Using Typescript Compiler API to generate Golang structs from official Notion SDK.

item.title: Implementing a lighting system
item.description: Very simple lighting system implementation with beginner graphics knowledge to give zworld a more interesting look.

item.title: Golang init() function
item.description: Practical example of a not so widely known function in Go to initialize packets before func main.

item.title: Zworld's Client Authentication protocol
item.description: Client authentication implementation for zworld based on Minecraftâ€™s protocol.

item.title: Apps
item.description: These are all of my open-source projects I've worked on or I'm currently working on.
